en_definition: one’s legal right to belong to a nation

an advantage or improvement
to interest you and make you want it
a large sea fish with very sharp teeth and a pointed fin on its back
an object, a person or a place that people aim at when attacking
a result that you try to achieve
to come near to somebody / something in distance or time
an act of using violence to try to hurt or kill somebody
to use violence to try to hurt or kill somebody
having a fine edge or point, especially of something that can cut or make a hole in something
the layer of tissue that covers the body
the quality of being physically strong
to put something firmly around something / somebody

to use your teeth to cut into or through something
failure to win or to be successful

to damage something so badly that it no longer exists, works, etc.
(of an animal, a being, etc.) able to understand and learn things
good at learning, understanding

en_definition: to fight somebody or try to get away from them
to try very hard to do something when it is difficult

further forward in space or time; in front
to make something continue at the same level, standard, etc.
to keep stating that something is true, even though other people do not agree
by a strikingly large amount or to a strikingly large extent; greatly
having a strong desire to know about something
a situation when there is not enough of the people or things that are needed
the small hard seeds of food plants such as wheat, rice, etc.
a single seed of such a plant
a period of ten years

a flat piece of metal, usually shaped like a coin, that is given to the winner of a competition
extremely good; excellent

wrong; not correct or true
